subject: Football
Bowl Games
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Stanford’s Toby Gerhart ran for 135 yards, but Oklahoma’s Landry Jones passed for 418 yards and threw three touchdown passes to Ryan Broyles in the Sun Bowl.
snippet: Stanford’s Toby Gerhart ran for 135 yards, but Oklahoma’s Landry Jones passed for 418 yards and threw three touchdown passes to Ryan Broyles in the Sun Bowl.
